baseNegative: score_4, score_3, score_2, score_1, worst quality, low quality, blurry, watermark, text

sprite.positive: score_9, game sprite, transparent background, centered, clean edges, isolated character

ui_icon.positive: score_9, flat icon, minimal, centered symbol, clean vector style

logo.positive: score_9, logo design, bold typography, clean geometry, brand identity

texture.positive: score_9, seamless tileable texture, uniform lighting, no borders

tile.positive: score_9, seamless tileable pattern, uniform, repeating design

overlay.positive: score_9, transparent overlay, VFX element, clean alpha edges

spritesheet.positive: score_9, game spritesheet, multiple frames, consistent character, uniform spacing, transparent background
spritesheet.negative: score_4, single image, background clutter, overlapping frames

notes: Default profile for Pony Diffusion V6 XL. Uses score-based quality tags native to the Pony V6 training data.
